column1: * Description      : To determine the Effective Date of recent Assignment  Attribute3 (Legacy P&L Location) change for an empployee in Assignment Record.
* Logic            : Compare the current (Legacy P&L Location) with previous rows until there is a change identified.
IF TRACE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN (RET = ESS_LOG_WRITE(' AXE_HR_DEP_CHANGE_RULE_FF- Starts '))

IF TRACE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN (RET = ESS_LOG_WRITE(' S_PERSON_ID = '|| S_PERSON_ID|| ', ' || ' S_ASSIGNMENT_ID = '|| S_ASSIGNMENT_ID|| ', ' || ' S_ASG_START_DATE = '|| S_ASG_START_DATE || ', '|| ' L_DEP_CODE = '|| L_DEP_CODE))

column3: IF TRACE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN (RET = ESS_LOG_WRITE(' L_HIST_ASS_ID = '|| TO_CHAR(L_HIST_ASS_ID) || ', '||' L_LEG_PL_LOCATION = '|| L_LEG_PL_LOCATION || ', '||' L_HIST_ASS_START = '|| to_char( L_HIST_ASS_START ) ))

column2: IF (PER_HIST_ASG_ASSIGNMENT_TYPE[L_COUNTER] = 'E' AND PER_HIST_ASG_EFFECTIVE_START_DATE[L_COUNTER] < L_ASG_STRT_DATE AND (L_ASG_STRT_DATE >= L_HIRE_DATE AND S_TERM_DATE <> ' ') )THEN

column3: IF TRACE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN (RET = ESS_LOG_WRITE(' L_HIST_ASS_ID = '|| TO_CHAR(L_HIST_ASS_ID) || ', '||' L_LEG_PL_LOCATION = '|| L_LEG_PL_LOCATION|| ', '||' L_HIST_ASS_START = '|| to_char(L_HIST_ASS_START ) ))

column1: IF TRACE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN (RET = ESS_LOG_WRITE(' Return Value = '|| RULE_VALUE))
IF TRACE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN (RET = ESS_LOG_WRITE(' AXE_HR_DEP_CHANGE_RULE_FF- Ends '))
